message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $95. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to propose a price of $85 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value in this product. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $87 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
